name: Prime_8
description:
There is only one thing you can do to survive if you get sucked into your computer by a malevolent being. Play the game and beat the boss. 

Do you have what it takes to avoid assimilation into the Prime_8 program? 

Prime_8 is a text based dungeon crawler with a Galaga like boss fight. Headphones recommended as sound is used during the boss fight.

Enjoy! 

Music/SFX Credits: 

"Ex/DNBD" by techtheist, used under CC / Edits: Cut three parts from original track. Intro, main theme, and end. Used those sections as loops throughout the boss fight menus and the fight itself.  

"PlayerHurt2" by mrickey13

"Splat.ogg" by gprosser

"Hard Hit" by blosche, used under CC

"Sword Hit Heavy" by EminYILDIRIM, used under CC

"Retro Lasers" by bubaproducer, used under CC
